text: @dockaurG 1st clear sign that the tests react falsely. Fishy: Mexican health authorities trying to understand how a set of newborn triplets became infected even though neither of their parents tested positive. The triplets... were tested 4(!) hours after being born https://t.co/GvAjqAgmnw
